踏み締める: (ふみしめる) - to step firmly; to harden by treading
踏み荒す: (ふみあらす) - to trample down; to devastate
踏み荒らす: (ふみあらす) - to trample down; to devastate
踏み越える: (ふみこえる) - to step over or across; to overcome
踏み躙る: (ふみにじる) - to trample underfoot; to tread on; to crush with a foot
踏み込み: (ふみこみ) - dealing fully (with)/going into (issue, etc.)/stepping into/breaking or rushing into; alcove
踏み込む: (ふみこむ) - to step into (e.g. someone else's territory)/to break into/to raid; to come to grips with/to get to the core of
踏み迷う: (ふみまよう) - to lose one's way; to go astray
踏み違える: (ふみちがえる) - to misstep; to stray
踏み面: (ふみづら) - tread (of a wheel); step (of a stair)
踏み鳴らす: (ふみならす) - to stamp one's feet
踏む: (fumu) - to step on, to tread on, to trample on; to set foot on (ex.: solo estrangeiro), to stand on, to visit , to step on, to tread on, to trample on; to set foot on (e.g. foreign soil), to stand on, to visit; to experience, to undergo; to follow (rules, principles, etc.), to go through (e.g. formalities), to complete
踏んだり蹴ったり: (ふんだりけったり) - it never rains but it pours; misfortunes never come singly
踏んづける: (ふんづける) - to trample down; to tread on
踏んばる: (ふんばる) - to brace one's legs; to straddle; to stand firm; to plant oneself (somewhere); to hold out; to persist
踏ん付ける: (ふんづける) - to trample down; to tread on
踏ん反り返る: (ふんぞりかえる) - to lie on one's back with legs outstretched/to recline; to get cocky/to be arrogant
踏ん張る: (ふんばる) - to brace one's legs; to straddle; to stand firm; to plant oneself (somewhere); to hold out; to persist
踏付ける: (ふみつける) - to trample down/to tread on; to ignore/to spurn
踏出す: (ふみだす) - to step forward/to step forth/to advance; to start/to embark on/to set forth on/to take steps toward
踏切: (ふみきり) - railway crossing/railroad crossing/train crossing/level crossing; starting line/scratch; determination; {sumo} stepping over the edge of the ring
踏切り: (ふみきり) - railway crossing/railroad crossing/train crossing/level crossing; starting line/scratch; determination; {sumo} stepping over the edge of the ring
踏切番: (ふみきりばん) - gatekeeper; crossing guard
踏台: (ふみだい) - stool (stood on to reach high objects)/small stepladder; (figurative) stepping stone
踏換える: (ふみかえる) - to change, e.g. step
踏板: (ふみいた) - board (across a ditch, etc.); step/tread/footboard/running board; pedal (of an organ, etc.)/treadle
踏歌: (とうか) - type of dance where the ground is stamped (Heian period)
踏歩変換: (とうほへんかん) - lead change (horse gait)
踏殺す: (ふみころす) - to trample to death; to kill underfoot
踏破: (とうは) - travelling on foot/traveling on foot; travelling all over
踏絵: (ふみえ) - tablet bearing Christian images, on which Edo-period authorities forced suspected Christians to trample
踏継ぎ: (ふみつぎ) - stool (stood on to reach high objects)
踏荒らす: (ふみあらす) - to trample down; to devastate
踏襲: (とうしゅう) - following (e.g. suit, in someone's footsteps, etc.); emulation
踏鞴を踏む: (たたらをふむ) - to stumble a step or two forward (when trying to stop); to pass one's destination and stumble a step or two forward; to totter
踝: (か) - Tornozelo, tornozelo, maléolo, osso do tornozelo
踞う: (つくばう) - to crouch; to squat
踞る: (うずくまる) - to crouch; to squat; to cower
踠き苦しむ: (もがきくるしむ) - to writhe in agony
踠く: (もがく) - to struggle/to wriggle/to squirm/to writhe; to be impatient
踵: (しょう) - Heel , heel (de pé, sapato, meia, etc.)
踵を返す: (くびすをかえす) - to turn on one's heel; to turn back; to return
踵落とし: (かかとおとし) - axe kick; ax kick
踵骨: (しょうこつ) - calcaneus; calcaneum; heel bone
蹂躙: (じゅうりん) - trampling down; overrunning; infringement; violation
蹂躪: (じゅうりん) - trampling down; overrunning; infringement; violation
蹄行性: (ていこうせい) - unguligrade (walking on hooves)
蹄鉄工: (ていてつこう) - farrier; horseshoer; blacksmith
蹈襲: (とうしゅう) - following (e.g. suit, in someone's footsteps, etc.); emulation
蹈鞴を踏む: (たたらをふむ) - to stumble a step or two forward (when trying to stop); to pass one's destination and stumble a step or two forward; to totter
蹌踉ける: (よろける) - to stagger; to stumble
蹌踉つく: (よろつく) - to stagger; to stumble; to totter
蹌踉めく: (よろめく) - to stagger; to misconduct oneself/to have a love affair/to waver/to feel some inclination
蹙める: (しかめる) - to pull a wry face; to screw one's face up; to pucker one's face; to scowl; to grimace; to frown
蹠行性: (しょこうせい) - plantigrade (walking on the soles of the feet)
蹣跚ける: (よろける) - to stagger; to stumble
蹲い: (つくばい) - stone wash basin found in Japanese gardens
蹲う: (つくばう) - to crouch; to squat
蹲み込む: (しゃがみこむ) - to squat; to crouch down (completely, generally with face looking through knees)
蹲む: (つくなむ) - to squat; to crouch
蹲る: (つくばる) - to crouch; to squat; to cower
蹲踞: (そんきょ) - {sumo;MA} crouching; formal crouch performed at the beginning of a sumo or kendo match
蹴とばす: (けとばす) - to kick away/to kick off/to kick hard; to refuse curtly/to reject outright
蹴りあげる: (けりあげる) - to kick up; to fling up
蹴りだす: (けりだす) - to kick out (e.g. someone from a house)
蹴りつける: (けりつける) - to kick (at someone, something)
蹴り上げる: (けりあげる) - to kick up; to fling up
蹴り付ける: (けりつける) - to kick (at someone, something)
蹴り入れる: (けりいれる) - to kick (into something, e.g. a goal)
蹴り出す: (けりだす) - to kick out (e.g. someone from a house)
蹴り殺す: (けりころす) - to kick to death
蹴り返す: (けりかえす) - to kick back (ball, person, etc.)
蹴り飛ばす: (けりとばす) - to kick flying (often a person in sport, martial arts, etc.)
蹴る: (keru) - to kick; to refuse, to reject , to kick; to refuse, to reject; to stamp (no chão), to firmly press one's feet (against something)
